jobTitle: VP Sales - North America - Conversational AI
industry: Telecommunications, Information Services, and Financial Services
description:
Our client is a USA East Coast-headquartered stealth mode start-up that is backed by some of the most renowned serial entrepreneurs in analytics and AI technologies.

The board and management team combine deep industry knowledge and financial muscle and they are set to launch a truly next-generation conversational AI agent solution to the market. They are looking for a leader that can help the business scale in North America.

The ideal candidate is someone who can scale up as the company grows and therefore it is important that the successful candidate is happy being hands-on with customers in the early days of the go-to-market plan. They will explore both direct sales and channel sales opportunities.

We can't give any more information at this stage but if you are interested in engaging further please fill out the application I will come back to you when I can reveal more.

Please ignore the salary levels mentioned on the job board - packages are flexible depending on the person
